channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 08:35 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:35 Driven the alarm to Donetsk region.Creat by further messages.#Donetsk This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:34 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.
item.description: 游릭 08:34 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Watch for further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 08:34 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Salt for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 08:34 Alarm in Kharkiv and Kharkiv Territorial Community. Salt for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:34 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 08:34 Alarm to the Kharkiv region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Kupyansky district- Kharkiv district- Lauda territorial community- Vovchansk Territorial Community#Kharkiv_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 08:22 Run the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community. Consider, alarm is still in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 08:22 Run the threat of artobrats in Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community.
